title: Betty Zeit 10/9: 25th Amendment, Madrid, WHO, Mel Gibson, Rush Limbaugh
itunes:title: Betty Zeit 10/9: 25th Amendment, Madrid, WHO, Mel Gibson, Rush Limbaugh
description:
On this edition of Betty Zeit Jack and Miles discuss Nancy Pelosi really pushing the whole 25th Amendment thing, Madrid declares a state of emergency due to COVID spread, WHO releases a statement saying we are peaking globally in COVID cases, there's a new Mel Gibson film in the works, and the President went on Rush Limbaugh to lie and curse.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
